document_data.name: ''Arrow of Detonation''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Arrows of detonation''''' were [[arrow]]s [[enchanted]] with volatile and dangerous magics.
document_data.Powers: When fired, ''arrows of detonation'' flew towards their targets and upon collision, exploded in a debilitating burst of fire and shrapnel. The exploding effect was similar to that of the ''[[fireball]]'' [[spell]].
document_data.History: In the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], ''arrows of detonation'' could be found on the [[Sword Coast]], notably, in the cities of [[Athkatla]] in [[Amn]] ''Arrows of detonation'' were also among enchanted ammunition sold at the gladiatorial arena in [[Thay]], ran by [[Dennaton]], a [[Red Wizard]].
document_data.Notable Users:
*[[Angelo Dosan]], a corrupt [[Flaming Fist]] officer who was in cahoots with the infamous [[Bhaalspawn]] [[Sarevok]] during the [[iron crisis]] of [[1369 DR]].
*[[Halbazzer Drin]], the proprietor of Sorcerous Sundries in Baldur's Gate in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century DR.
*[[Rahvin]], a member of the Flaming Fist from [[Sembia]] and another servant of Sarevok's in 1369 DR.
